<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Decrease the shazzam batch size from 5000 to 1000 to allow the TLS payload.</description>
        <name>Change default for shazzam batch size</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
dictionaryGR.addQuery('name', 'discovery_schedule');
dictionaryGR.addQuery('element', 'shazzam_batch_size');
dictionaryGR.addQuery('default_value', '5000');
dictionaryGR.query();

if (dictionaryGR.next()) {
	dictionaryGR.setValue('default_value', '1000');
	dictionaryGR.update();
}
]]></script>
